title: Wood Half-Elf
content:
for stealth. Yet many break away from isolation in Faerun's forests to explore the rest of the Realms.

Wood Half-Elf Traits in Baldur's Gate 3

Fleet of Foot: Move up to 10.5m per turn. Mask of the Wild: Proficiency in the Stealth skill.

BG3 Half-Elf Features

Base Racial Speed: Move up to 9m per turn. Civil Militia: Proficiency with Spears, Pikes, Halberds, and Glaives, Light Armour and Shield. Fey Ancestry: Advantage onSaving Throws against beingCharmed, and magic can't put you tosleep. Dark
